text:
To his parents: Thank you for bringing such an amazing man into this world. He is so talented, and it's an honor to know him and to be able to see him perform and to hear his angelic vocals,  his passion, and silly humor. ❤ Just his smile alone brings us joy.

To Seungmin: You are an amazing, talented young man, and we stays love you and the other strays. All of you work so hard, and we don't take it for granted. This song is beautifully written, and your voice is so soothing to listen to. It's heartwarming. Thank you so much for everything you do for us! ❤

author: @haru_1511
text:
概要欄に歌詞を載せていることから、この曲に、歌詞に、こめた想いの強さがうかがえます。ハニがよくスンミンの歌唱力を褒めていますが、この曲はスンミンの歌の魅力をよく引き出していて、そういったところからもメンバー間の愛を感じ取りました。

개요란에 가사를 싣고 있으므로, 이 곡에, 가사에, 담은 마음이 전해져 옵니다. 하니가 종종 승민의 가창력을 칭찬하고 있지만, 이 곡은 승민의 노래의 매력을 잘 이끌어내고, 그런 곳에서도 멤버들 사이의 사랑을 느꼈습니다.

text: My dog just died two days ago and I felt very devastated. I've been crying everyday because of the pain of losing my dog. Seungmin, han, stray kids, do you know how much comfort you are giving me right now? You are really one of the best thing that came into my life. Thank you so much. Really, thank you with all my heart. And to my dog, my doby, I hope you are somewhere safe and happy. I miss you sm. I'll always remember how I call you and come to me excitedlyy. I will always remember you, forever. Sorry, I couldn't protect you until the end. I love youu, forever.

author: @alixgorgas4589
text: Back in April, my dog had passed away. He was my best friend. He was the only thing that could make me happy when I was struggling most. I loved him more than anything and I miss him everyday. Today when I listened to this song for the first time and seen what the meaning of this song was, I cried. I cried so hard. I would do anything to be able to see my dog again, my sweet angel. To see him run to the door to greet me after my long band practices, to cuddle with me when I have had a bad day. This song gave me a sense that he will always be with me no matter where he is and I have found a comfort in this song that I could never find in another. I hope others can find that same comfort in this song as well. Thank you Seungmin. Thank you Stray Kids. Thank you for helping me find my emotions again through your music.

author: @jujuvinhaa
text: Emotionally, I'm not cool at all. Today I received negative news that hurt me a lot, that even though I got over it soon, at the moment it hurt a lot, but minutes later, Seungmin released this song. I don't even know how to express what I felt with words, but for sure, it's one of the most beautiful songs I've ever heard. When I listened to it, I improved my mood a lot. Seungmin, you managed to color such a painful moment for me, and I am extremely grateful. Thank you for that hug, which, even if it's not a hug, is one of the most comforting I've ever received. 💕

text: seungmin, our puppy, and hannie i really thank you for this song. my dog passed away last year and i wasn’t able to be there with him in his last moments. this song made me remember everything i truly love about him ever since the day i got him. i got him when i was 6, so ten years ago. this song moved me in a way i didn’t know i could be moved. thank you min for letting me re live why i loved my baby so much one more time. thank you for always being you and smiling to stay, never stop being seungmin. and han, never stop doing what you love, you’re amazing at it. i hope to see everything you want to show us. love you guys❤️

author: @anyalbornoz
text:
Ahora pude escuchar bien esta canción... Leí la letra, la sentí ... Y me emocioné con ella... Me hizo recordar a mis perritos... Que ya no están conmigo... A mi gatita, que llegó a mi vida cuando más la necesite... Y tengo miedo de algún día perderla... Solo espero ser la mejor mamá para ella... Y cuidarla como ella lo hizo conmigo cuando sentía que no tenía nada... Gracias Han por crearla, gracias seungmin por ponerle esa voz preciosa a esta canción tan hermosa y a Channie, que también se sabe que está detrás de todo esto poniendo todo su talento. Hoy, stay lloró. Mucha nostalgia. Pero principalmente alegría por traer a nuestra memoria, recuerdos tan hermosos de nuestros amigos que ahora nos cuidan desde el cielo. 
Un abrazo a todos a la distancia. Les envío todo mi cariño. 💙

author: @fdfd73
text:
할머니께 드린다고 오빠가 하얀새끼고양이 데리고 먼저 집에 왔는데 진짜 하얗고 조그맣고😆 반해가지구 엄마한테 우리집에서 키우면 안돼??🥺🥹
근데 엄마는 얘가 먼저 떠나갈텐데 감당할 수 있겠냐고
좀생각이 들었지만 그땐 너무 그 예쁜 애를 더 보고 싶고 같이 살고 싶어서, 그렇게 지금까지 6년 같이 살고 있는데
점점 다가올 날을 생각하면 눈물나는데
또 울고 나서 드는 생각은 가기 전까지 행복하고 예쁨받았으면 좋겠어서 더 잘해주고 
물론 또 망각하고 덜 놀아줄 때도 있고,, 또 정신차리고,,
키우고싶다는 주변사람한테는 최대한 말린다 
매일매일 행복하고 행복하지만 아가도 행복하게 해주면서 털을 감당할 수 있는지. 혼자두게 하는 시간이 많고 길지않게 할 수 있는지.
승민이가 걱정하는 여러가지 고민과 맘이 너무 공감이 돼서😥😥
적당하고 좋은 시기가 오는 날, 혹은 너가 맘이 결심한 날
데리고 와서 행복했으면 좋겠어~❤
행복할 거야~ 애기때도 이쁘고 커서도 애기같이 이쁘거든~ 너무 귀여워서 웃고 이상한 행동이나 표정에도 웃고😂 
노래 듣는데 우리아가 생각나고 눈물난다
좋은 노래 들려줘서 고마워~한이 승민이

author: @bish6942
text: My dog just died a few weeks ago, he was just happily wagging his tail as usual at that time but when it was night, he suddenly looked hurt and sad. I thought he was just sleepy and all, but the way he looked at me with his eyes, as if he was saying that he's gonna be gone tomorrow and that was our last time seeing each other. And in the next day,  he was gone. I haven't fully recovered from that yet, but this song really gives me comfort amidst that experience. Tysm 3racha and seungmin for another masterpiece:)

text:
I saw seungmin and knew it was a masterpiece without even listening to it and now that I've heard it it's such a beautiful song:) lost of love to straykids from America ❤❤ 

To seungmin: Dear Seungmin, I know people have been saying for you to stop smiling because they say your smile is ugly. Your smile is not ugly it is one of the most beautiful smiles I have ever seen and we ask you to smile more because we all miss your smile so much. Don't listen to the haters seungmin❤ whatever they say is just them being jealous of you so don't take them seriously <3

From, Annonmus(won't share my real name💀)

Really hope he sees because it took a while to write lol😂

text:
Плачу. Я теряла своего любимца... Так тяжело отпускать. Так тяжело принять эту боль. Остаётся лишь жить с ней. Я знаю, что ты был счастлив со мной ❤Буду всегда тебя помнить. 
Ребята, Хан, Сынмин, спасибо за ваше искусство, спасибо за то, что можете поднимать сложные темы. Душераздирающе💔Однако, это наша жизнь, мы должны принимать все её аспекты, мы не одни. Пусть души людей и животных буду счастливы как при жизни, так и после смерти, ведь, в конечном счёте, это просто часть Большого Пути. Мы встретимся в следующей жизни 🤍

author: @klaudiaszemeredi7295
text: When I first heard the song, my first thought was that this song might be about stay and skz connection. But when I listened to it again, I got the sudden feeling that "oh.. this might be about losing someone. Like a dog. This might be about losing my dog.." This made me tear up as a listened to it again with this new meaning. But after I scrolled down to see who wrote the song, I saw Han's name. I suddenly got so emotional that I started crying. "I would have known.." This was my first reaction when I saw his name. Seungmin was a perfect choice for this song, the emotions came through very well. The other thing that made me cry is that I realized how much deep emotion Han carries with him. He has such deep feelings that it is probably very difficult for him to talk about, or he cannot tell them at all. And that's exactly why he expresses them through songs. This truly made me cry. Thank you <3

author: @judethefourth336
text:
Having an old dog who has been with my since my childhood, through my adolescence and the start of my adult life... this song brought me to tears. Seungmin's voice is so warm and calms my shattered heart by the thought of that, one day, sooner than I want to, my best tiny friend will no longer be by my side. Thank you Han Jisung also for writing these beautiful lyrics. Both of you, all of Stray Kids, are always able to heal the wounds of my soul and express the feelings I never have the correct words for. Thank you once again. I love you, and I love you my little fluffy friend, I hope we can stay together for more years to come 💗

Edit: I just lost him yesterday and there is this incredibly huge hole carved on my chest. I feel so empty and devoid of energy. He was my sunshine. I spent some of his last hours for the whole night with him until we could bring him to the vet. I can't still believe it's real. I still hope to see him sleeping in his bed. But this songs says what I desire, to one day be reunited with him, see him again full of youthful energy, happy and with full mobility. I want to hold him in my arms forever.

author: @makeilameadows
text:
This song definitely hits hard. Losing a animal friend/family member and one that you love with all your heart, is soul crushing. Watching as they go across the rainbow bridge is something that stays with you, it’s a hard decision to let go of a sick fur family member or even it happening without knowing what happened to them. I’ve had to say goodbye to many fur family members and unfortunately it never gets easier. 

Jisung definitely knows how to write a song where almost everyone can relate to and paired with Seungmins voice  is a beautiful combination. 😢❤

text:
my heart hurts,, I love this song, it's genuinely beautiful. it made me think about my precious doggie who passed away some time ago, and though the thought made me tear up, I also felt great comfort from this song ❤
 thank you seungmin for singing so beautifully,, your way of making someone feel so profoundly through singing is truly out of this world🌷
and thank you Han for writing so !! SO !! wonderfully, your way of writing lyrics never fails to amaze me, really. you're so good at it!! i can't express it with words!! you always make me feel inmersed and all the lyrics break my heart!! and i mean it in a good way 🤧. thank you always!!!
and thank you chan, han again and versachoi for always producing such good songs, I'll always listen to them!✨

Asi que nada, esta cancion inmediatamente se volvio muy significativa para mi, creo que muchxs podemos identificarnos con ella. Gracias Han por escribirla y gracias Seungmin por interpretarla, su voz es tan preciosa y transmite tanto 🥺🤍

author: @undine1998
text: У меня была не собака, а кот. От песни рыдаю. Его не стало 2 года назад. Он был со мной 16,5 лет и умер у меня на руках. На следующий день после моего дня рождения. В тот день во мне тоже что-то умерло. А на следующий день я пошла защищать диплом. Именно тогда я поняла, каково это - "ощущать всё как в тумане". Он появился в моей жизни, когда я пошла в 1 класс. Он всегда встречал меня со школы у порога. И ушел, когда я окончила университет. Последнюю его фотографию я сделала за пару недель до смерти. Он сидел и ждал мою маму с работы на этом самом пороге. Он всегда живёт в моём сердце, хоть и улетел на радугу 01.07.2021 ❤

text:
I don't know how to express what I feel. so I'll just try to tell the story.

Recently my dog ​​passed away. she was already 13 or 14, can't remember. I knew her all my life, so I didn’t understand how important she was to me in full. she just lived with us like, idk, my older sister? 
one day I was practicing a new program (I am a pianist). my father came into my room with the words "Daffy died." I didn't believe him so I ran into the yard (Daffy lived in a booth, she was quite large). At first I didn't understand why my dad was trying to stop me. then I realized... Daffy was laying under our dogwood tree. without breathing. I rushed to my room, dad behind me. but there was nothing on my face at all. I was just waiting for him to leave. 
I was in such shock. nothing foreshadowed a trouble. she ran and play as always, ate well... I was able to keep my face until my father left. but as soon as the door closed, I started silently crying.

I haven't shed a tear in the past year and a half (Daffy passed away on 03/23/22). I didn't cry at all, even when I was alone. Didnt laugh or smth. just living. It was as if strong emotions had been turned off in me, idk. my maximum is to smile at a joke or mourn under the series. Even my mom wanted to put me in a psychiatric hospital for a while, just becausr i changed so much "just because of a dog".

Now Im crying. I myself was a little confused when felt a lump in my throat. But I cried! Thank you so much Seungmin and Han for this! Lately i've really begun to believe that I'm not capable of such emotions anymore.

I didn't even know the translation of the song, seriously. When I saw it, I cried even harder. maybe it's because I'm like 3? years old stan Skz and I subconsciously understand some phrases. maybe (most likely) because of Seungmin's emotion in his voice, I don't know...


just thank you for making me cry (sounds weird doesn't it haha). For the first time in a year, I feel relatively alive. love you. Thank you.


sorry for being sloppy in the comments. if you don't like it, reply to the comment, I'll read it and delete it, no problem.

Thank you. Sorry.

text:
무감정한 매일에 내일을 꾸게 한 너야
during my colorless days, you made me dream of tomorrow

this, this hits hard. every single word of this incredibly beautiful song touches my soul, but this sentence sticks out to me. i need to wear this as a tattoo on my body, like a permanent piece of art, just like the lyrics is. i'll proudly display the art that is han jisung's writing for all eternity. when someone asks "oh, what does that mean?" i'll tell them all about this beautiful song, about the incredible writer and artist han jisung, and about stray kids. i'll recommend them this song, tell him how it has touched my soul and will touch theirs too.

this is probably a lot to hope for, but if there is any chance you see this han, could you possibly write it down and share a picture of it? it would be a dream to have it tattoo'd in your handwriting. even if you don't see this and don't post it, i will still get it 100%, but for now i'll wait in the off chance you do see this. (i'll also wait... because... i need to save up so i can actually get the tattoo lmao xD but that's deetaailss :P)

author: @bekka99
text:
do you know what is a beautiful feeling? knowing that i right now am moved to tears by this incredible song alongside many more stays. i can feel it in my heart. many of us are crying at the same time, and if not crying then still so incredibly moved by the extremely touching lyrics, by the beautiful music and by our beloved min's angelic voice blessing us once again. 

all my love goes to every stay who can relate to this song, you're not alone my love. ❤ my dear hannie, neither are you. stay will always be right here with you honey. ❤ the pain of losing a beloved pet is... soul wrenching, heart breaking. thank you for writing this song. a song we can turn to when we experience that pain ourselves, when we reminisce about our past beloved pets. thank you jisung, thank you chan, thank you seungmin, thank you versachoi, thank you nickko young.

tw: death

to end this off, i woke up today after a horrible nightmare, it was about death, about losing my mother, she's sick so i'm scared. the nightmare was scarily realistic and the crappy feeling it brought me has been lingering all day. at the same time i'm scared of losing my cat, as she is getting old. her time is near, no matter how deeply i wish it wasn't. this entire day has passed by in a blur. but this song, that i've spent who knows how long listening to on repeat by now, helped bring out the tears that have been needing to come out. the timing of this song being released is scarily accurate to my personal situation, to when i need it the most. but who's surprised, stray kids came into my life two years and three months ago at a time where i needed them. it's only fitting this song does the same.
thank you again. i'm going to keep this song near and dear to my heart. i can always count on stray kids to help me feel better in tough times. thank you, i love you deeply. ❤

author: @cjvaldez1026
text:
The melody, the song, all of it is great. I felt like I am listening to an ending song of a series. I love it❤️ I also love the soft rock beat of it as well. 

The song is great❤️❤️❤️

Edit: Now that I read the translation properly, i cried. The song is about the dogs and their owners. Then, i suddenly remembered our first dog who passed away due to sickness. I literally cried while i was working since he endured a lot. Currently, we have three dogs but the thought of them leaving us someday is terrifying. A dog's lifespan is shorter than humans and I want to cherish every moment we have.

author: @アルファベットまかろに
text:
私は生まれる前からわんちゃんがいる家庭に育ったのでわんちゃんが大大大好きです。
だから、推しがこういった歌を歌ってくださってとても嬉しいです。
1匹目のわんちゃんは私が小学生の時に亡くなってしまいましたが、今は中学生の時にお迎えした2匹目のわんちゃんと毎日かけがえのない尊い時間を過ごしています。

author: @bekka99
text:
wow... this hit home. this really hit home. i'm currently terrified of losing my cat, she's getting quite old now, so it's constantly on my mind that she might not be here with me for much longer. seeing that han wrote this song released the tears that were trying to escape, i got some much needed crying done. thank you han, thank you for sharing this piece of your soul with us. thank you channie and versachoi for helping composing it, and nickko young for helping arrange it, and deeply thank you seungminnie for singing your beautiful heart out and blessing us with your vocals. your voice soothes my soul and brings me peace. there are no words in existence that could ever describe just how truly beautiful your voice is. you have the voice of an angel, and you are stay's angel minnie. 

han, you never fail to amaze me with your writing. you truly have a gift, yet, at the same time, it's so clear that you work endlessly hard to be this incredible and to keep growing as an artist. we can see it, stay sees your hard work paying off. with every song you share with us i get more inspired to work hard for my dreams. with every song you share with us you heal another piece of my heart, another piece of my soul. you make me feel heard, feel seen, feel understood. i'm beyond lucky that i get to witness the beautiful results of your hard work time and time again, lucky that i get to see a little part of your heart. you mean so much to me my dear jisung. stays love you so much.

the song is on repeat while it's pouring rain outside, while my lights are off. i'm just sitting here in my feelings processing everything. i've lost sight of how much time has passed, how many times i've listened to the song now. the rain knew it was time to rain when i listened first, it's perfect while listening to this masterpiece of a song. the only "problem" i have right now is i want to listen to the song while wearing headphones, but then i can't hear the rain. xD such a hard problem, i know. :P

once again, thank you for this masterpiece hannie. han your writing is some of the most beautiful art that has ever been and ever will be. i'm so beyond grateful that i get to be your fan and witness the greatness that is han jisung. aaand here comes the tears again haha, i'm just so eternally grateful, thankful, that i get to live at the same time as you, be the same age as you and go through life parallel with you. i will forever be by your side, by chan's, by minnie's and all of our wonderful boys' sides. thank you stray kids for being here, for being born, for sharing your passion with us. thank you. i love you, more than i could ever say, more than i could ever properly convey. i hope you are able to feel mine and all of stays love to you in some way.

when my baby, my cat, ascends the rainbow bridge i will find great comfort in this song, as well as jinnie's "i miss you". i am truly lucky that i get to turn to my stray kids when i'll be going through tough times in my life. i can never say it enough: i'm eternally grateful to be a stay, and eternally grateful to you. thank you. all the love to you my dearest stray kids.

stray kids everywhere all around the world. you're going to keep growing and enrich more people's lives because you are here, because you exist, because of you sharing your dreams and beautiful work with the world. i hope all eight of you feel the same amount of happiness through you life that you've brought me, because it has been an endless amount. 
i love you.

author: @Skzlovur7
text:
On March 29th, 2023, my 8 year old bernese mountain dog sadly passed away. But somehow this song didn't make me sad again, it gave me peace. It makes me look back on the memories with my beautiful dog and I smiled while thinking about my dog, which I haven't been able to do since she passed. Well, now I'm starting to tear up again XD. The thought that when I pass one day and she's there waiting for me, gives me alot of comfort, thank you endlessly Seungmin and Han for this masterpiece of a song.
I love and miss you, Jacky <3

author: @noeasyshyba
text: I really wasn't Prepared for this song when I started listening to it. It's a beautiful song that caused me to start crying a lot about half way through because maybe a month after I found Stray Kids and became a Stay, I lost my Dog that has been in the Family for 12 years. It was a really hard time and still struggle with missing him sometimes. These Lyric.. they really capture that feeling and the thoughts I think when I miss him, even in the way it says closing their eyes for the last time.. I still cry a lot when I come home after a while and he isn't there at the door wagging his tail like the Song says. So, thank you for this beautiful song that brings me a kind of sad comfort.

Sometimes I didn't even get to properly take my shoes off, so I just sat on the floor and pet and played with her for hours. I really miss her. This song reminds me that I´ll see her again one day. Thank you for writing this.
<3

Listened to this the first time without lyrics and thought it was beautiful. Then I listened to it reading the lyrics and realized what it was about and am in tears.
I grew up with my dog, my buddy and he passed away just under two years ago and it still hurts like hell. I know that if I get a dog one day I will go through that sadness again. Mannnn this song has made me so emotional … it’s so beautiful and so deeply understands the love and pain that comes from a pet.

author: @ellieh136
text:
Seungmin, sir, I'm gonna need you to stop making me cry so much, please and thank you (keep it up, they're good tears). You already blow me away every day with yourself and your voice (which I'm so glad you get to share with the world! It's so well deserved), but this song.... You did an amazing job on this. It's so beautiful. And Han did such an amazing job on the lyrics. I really felt both of your passions through your voice, and his lyrics. I have lost three dogs in my lifetime so far. The first one was my soul dog. My best friend while i was growing up. One of the very few constants in my life. Losing him was like losing a piece of me. The second, passed away suddenly while I was away at university. I didn't even get to say goodbye, and that tears me apart every single day. The third, I didn't have him for a long time, only a few days, but I was so connected to him. He hasn't passed away, I just wasn't in a position to keep him, and in order to give him the life he deserves, I had to give him up, but I think about him every single day. So this song hits so so hard for me. Thank you for such a beautiful gift, Minnie. I want you to know that it is seen, it is heard, and it is appreciated <3
All my love <3

author: @luulasm
text:
Realmente me encantó, amo su voz, el hecho de que es tan delicada y causa un confort en mi es simplemente hermoso❤. 
En serio que su voz es muy dulce, única, relajante y millones de palabras que podría escribir, pero no serían suficiente, me encanta como es tan reconfortante escucharlo cantar. Solo con escuchar su voz me siento como nueva, no importa el momento admirar tan  increíble y única voz que tiene es lo suficiente que necesito para sentirme feliz❤.
Kim seungmin, sos lo mejor de mi vida, y estar acá para ver tus logros y el gran trabajo y esfuerzo que haces y demostras es simplemente magnífico. Ya se me acaban las palabras para expresar como me siento, pero solo quiero que sepas que sos lo mejor de mi vida, I LOVE YOU SEUNGMIN❤❤

author: @Hi-f5h
text:
スンミン😭
犬を飼っている身として、そしてあなたの歌声だからこの曲はすごくすごく心に響いたよ🥲いつか会えなくなってしまうのはわかってるけど、その時が本当に怖い。今は暖かいあなたに触れる事が出来ているのにそれが出来なくなる時が来るって思うと辛くてたまらないよ😢でも今あの子と戯れている時が1番幸せだから
これからもたくさん愛情を注いでいきたいし、大切にしていきたいと思う🥲
スンミンの感受性は優しくて心が癒されるような曲ばかり。いつも本当に助けて貰ってるよ🥲
こんな曲を作って、歌ってくれてありがとう😭たくさん聴きます🐶

author: @kricle
text: Seungmin THANK YOU for singing this song. It's absolutely Beautiful. Han, THANK YOU for writing it. Honestly, I needed this one. Found out my pup has cancer that we can't do anything about.  Kind of just a time thing now. I'm afraid I'm going to need this song sooner than I want to admit. Cried listening and reading the lyrics, crying while writing this. But it is still very much appreciated. Thank you for always making meaningful beautiful music that we can all connect to. Please never stop sharing your amazing talents <3

author: @ПолинаКоршикова-ф1н
text:
В дождливый день, когда почти ничего не было видно
Ты пришла ко мне как подарок, ты принесла радость в бессмысленные дни
Просто наблюдая за тобой весь день, я улыбался
В бесцветные дни ты заставляла меня мечтать о завтрашнем дне
В тот день, когда ты впервые дала мне лапу
Не знаю, почему я прослезился
 
Когда ты бежала ко мне со всей силы, виляя хвостом
Это место, где единственное, что встречало меня, был свет входной двери, казалось мне счастливым
 
Хотя сейчас я не могу тебя видеть
Когда-нибудь, по прошествии времени
Когда я буду стоять перед тобой, пожалуйста
Прибеги ко мне еще раз
 
К тому времени, когда угли, прилипшие к моей печали
Медленно догорают и превращаются в белый пепел
Когда оставшийся пепел унесет ветер
Я снова назову твое имя
Держись
 
Я все еще помню, как ты смотрела на меня и улыбалась
До того момента, как ты закрыла глаза
Твои глаза говорили мне, что все хорошо, все в порядке,
Ты утешала меня до последнего момента
 
Когда ты бежала ко мне со всей силы, виляя хвостом
Это место, где единственное, что встречало меня, был свет входной двери, казалось мне счастливым
 
Хотя сейчас я не могу тебя видеть
Когда-нибудь, по прошествии времени
Когда я буду стоять перед тобой, пожалуйста
Прибеги ко мне еще раз
 
К тому времени, когда угли, прилипшие к моей печали
Медленно догорают и превращаются в белый пепел
Когда оставшийся пепел унесет ветер
Я снова назову твое имя
Держись
Просто держись
 
Радужная тропинка, по которой ты шла в тот последний раз
Интересно, видела ли ты мою руку, машущую тебе сзади?
Однажды, когда я пойду по той же тропе, по которой шла ты
Встретишь ли ты меня в конце
 
Хотя сейчас я не могу тебя видеть
Когда-нибудь, по прошествии времени
Когда я буду стоять перед тобой, пожалуйста
Прибеги ко мне еще раз
 
К тому времени, когда угли, прилипшие к моей печали
Медленно догорают и превращаются в белый пепел
Когда оставшийся пепел унесет ветер
Я снова назову твое имя
Держись

author: @aleksandra.pigeon
text:
Wow, it's so warm and soothing sing! Thank you, Stray kids's team! 
Спасибо ребятам огромное! Спасибо за то, что именно Сынмин исполнил данную композицию, потому что эта песня очень подходит ему))) 
Говорить про то, что он восхитительно поёт и чувствует/проживает каждую эмоцию в песне, бессмысленно, ведь все итак это знают
Но не забудем и про Хана, который написал этот волшебный текст, и про 3racha, которые написали музыку. Спасибо вам всем!

author: @yebunbong
text: oh god. im tearing up. han jisung and seungmin is a powerful combination indeed. the lyrics alone made me tear up and this is such beautiful song when seungmin sings it. i have admired stray kids for evoking emotions inside me that I did not even know were possible. i feel the beauty. the love, the pain, and all the hard work that made into writing this song and singing it with such an emotional voice that I cant help but feel every single thing that you want to say through this song. i hear the message loud and clear and I am once again in awe of than jisungs penship and kim seungmins vocal prowess. beautiful. beautiful. beautiful. beautiful song sung by a beautiful singer, written by a beautiful lyricist, from a beautiful group of people. my heart is so touched by this song. i hope you guys keep on making music like this that conveys your emotions and shows sincerity and passion. it is a pure joy to hear.

author: @BTS-nq4sb
text:
Seungmin's voice makes me cry because it clearly conveys the feelings I want to convey through the song.
I remembered someone important to me.
My significant other just became a star last summer.
It's kind of sad to think that another year has passed,
Even so, time flies by so quickly Even if we can't meet right now
I want to cherish the present moment. I'd be happy if straykids were there.

スンミンの声が、歌で伝えたい思いをはっきり伝えてくれるから泣けてくる。
大切な人を思い出しました。
私の大切な人はちょうど去年の夏に星になりました。
もう一年も経ったのかと思うとなんだかさみしくて、
それでも時間はすぐに過ぎてしまうから今すぐには会えなくてもいつかたくさん時間が経って会える日が来るまで
今を大切に生きていきたいです。そこにstraykidsがいてくれたら嬉しいな。

author: @boky21
text:
I don’t know how they do it but Stray Kids always releases the most perfect songs right when I need them. 

My childhood family dog is currently on palliative care and her date to be put down was set for Thursday but her condition has rapidly depleted and we think we may need to put her down before then. For this song to be released today, by my absolutely ultimate bias, I’m taking this as a sign that this is what was meant to be and everything will be okay. 

Thank you skz, thank you Han, thank you Seungmin. I’ll be okay and I will see her again.

Песня передаёт всю любовь к этим прекрасным созданиям, и как бы я хотела сейчас вновь обнять своего пса, приласкать его, чтобы он дал мне понять, что всё в порядке. Спасибо Хану за такой невероятно тёплый и трогательный текст, а Сынмину–за самое лучшее исполнение. Его голос.. он вызывает табун мурашек. Спасибо.

author: @rieandrique
text:
Listening to this and hearing the lyrics get me sobbing, my tears won't stop, like at all. I've also recently just lost my fur baby that literally saved my life because I was going through so damn much, and because of them being gone, I genuinely thought I was going to lose myself again. If it weren't for the babies that they left behind (although two of them are now resting peacefully somewhere up there), I would've been gone.

Which is why listening to this song is giving me so much comfort through the tears because of how much I can relate to it. Additionally, Seungmin's voice is so so good and so so angelic, I can tell why Hannie wanted Seungmin to be the one to sing this (our puppy boi Seungs). Thank you so much for a womderful SKZ-RECORD! Love this one so much

Невероятный Ким Сынмин,спасибо тебе большое за то,что украшаешь эти дни своим голосом. Прекрасный,восхитительный,очаровательный,лучший,не теряй своего оптимизма. Я очень тебя люблю,спасибо тебе еще раз большое.

author: @ТеорияХаоса-с3б
text: Спасибо Сынмину и ребятам за эту песню. Моего пса  не стало почти три года назад. Тогда я по личным обстоятельствам жила в другом городе, и не могла быть рядом с ним  и проводить его  в последний путь. Я помню, какой холодной и отстранённой я была, когда мама звонила мне, чтобы сообщить мне о состоянии нашего Викинга, о том что он уже воет от боли. Я помню как сказала только: "Усыпите его". (Тогда я думала, да и сейчас тоже, что действую в интересах собаки) Я знаю как больно было моей семье принимать это решение и как они страдали наблюдая за его мучениями. Я же была далеко и мне казалось, что если я ещё и отстранюсь эмоционально, то мне будет легче пережить потерю. Не стало, а к горю ещё и добавились сожаления. Я очень скучаю по моему Викингу.

I would dedicate this song to my best buddy my beloved Charlie

But now he is in peace and he gave me the hope to live on....
Dear Charlie I miss you everyday....

author: @spri5900
text:
눈물이 멈출 수 없이 흐른다… 
승민이의 목소리는 정말 따뜻하게 안아주는 느낌이에요.

내 말이라 미안한데 사실은 7월 31일에 강아지가  돌아가셨어요.
부모님이 바쁘셔서 혼자 있던 내 곁에 있어준 정말 정말 소중하고 둘도 없는 가족이라 생각하고는 아직도 통곡하고 있어요.
그래서 이렇게 해서 이 노래를 만날 줄 몰랐기 때문에 깜짝 놀랐다, 
이마음이 어떻게 말로 하면 좋을까?
확실하게 말할 수 있는 건 이 타이밍에 이런 멋진 노래 고마워요.

노래를 듣고 울어버리지만,
그래도 언젠가 이 노래를 들었을 때면, 나의 강아지와 보낸 소중한 날들을 떠올리고 따뜻한 마음이 될 수 있게 되고 싶다.

이 노래는 나에게 아주멋진 특별한선물이야. 
마가린즈 정말 고마워요.

author: @HannahNian0036
text:
Hold on 歌詞

下雨了 在眼前看不見的那種日子裡
像禮物一樣來到我身邊的你
在無意義的日子裡變得幸福
整天看著你的樣子
微笑無情的每一天都讓我看到明天的你
第一次把你的手遞給我的那天
我為什麼流下了眼淚

搖著尾巴用小身體全力奔跑的時候
只有玄關燈光歡迎的這個地方不知不覺變好了

雖然現在不能馬上見到你
總有一天會過很多時間
站在你面前的時候，那時候再一次
用力跑到我身邊來
在我悲傷的感情中深深附著的火種逐漸熄滅
剩下的白色灰被風吹走的時候
我會再叫你的名字
Hold on 

看著我笑到閉上眼睛的
還記得你的樣子。
沒關係
因為用都沒關係的眼神一直給我到最後的你

搖著尾巴用小身體全力奔跑的時候
只有玄關燈光歡迎的這個地方不知不覺變好了

雖然現在不能馬上見到你
總有一天會過很多時間
站在你面前的時候，那時候再一次
用力跑到我身邊來
在我悲傷的感情中深深附著的火種逐漸熄滅剩下的白色灰被風吹走的時候
我會再叫你的名字
Hold on
Just hold on

你看到我當時最後一次走的彩虹散步路後面搖晃的手了嗎？
隨著時間的流逝
你走過的路的時候
你會迎接我的盡頭嗎？

雖然現在不能馬上見到你
總有一天會過很多時間
站在你面前的時候，那時候再一次
用力跑到我身邊來
貼近我悲傷的感情
火種逐漸熄滅變白
剩下的骨灰被風吹走的時候
我會再叫你的名字
Hold on

author: @mikacasquejo
text:
I have an old dog and for the next weeks, i have to leave her home with the rest of my family and live near the university I'm studying at. The thing is, I know this dog to the bone. I'm the only one who will be able to read and understand her expressions and actions. My family can barely take care of her. I have to beg them to give her attention. No matter how many times I asked them if i could bring her with me, they said no because the electricity will increase, and keep giving me stupid reasons, mostly financially.

A dog, unlike to other people, is more than a dog. They're more than just for entertainment, more than a friend, a soulmate, or an emotional support. For me, my dog's my lifeline. She's old and I want to give her the best last years she deserves. But unfortunately, I'm just a kid who loved her so deeply and sometimes I despise my age for not being able to take care of her the way I want to. This song resonates.

author: @H6vftkk
text: I think everyone focused only on Sungmin's voice and did not really focus on the depth of the lyrics. If you delve deeper into understanding the meaning of the song, you will find that it carries all the feelings that Sungmin and stray kids  with STAYS in their journey. At the beginning of the song, he describes how Stays were supporting and holding on to stray kids and they were a source of hope for them, and then as if he was saying to stays with them until after the end and forever, and to stick to them as in the first place, even if many years have passed, and no matter how old and how old they are. Age and no matter how far they are away from us..., ❤this song really touched my heart and made me think, will the stray kids  and the stays still love each other as they are now, even after the end of the band's contract, even after many years have passed???

author: @H6vftkk
text: أعتقد ان الجميع ركز فقط على صوت سونغمين و لم يركزوا على عمق الكلمات حقا  إذا تعمقتم في فهم معاني الأغنية ستجدون انها تحمل جميع  المشاعر التي مر بها سونغمين و الفرقة مع ستايز  في مسيرتهم. في بداية الاغنية يصف كيف ان ستايز كانو يدعمون و  متمسكين باأطفال ظالين و كانو مصدر أمل لهم و  بعدها كأنه يقول ان نبقى معهم إلى مابعد النهاية و للأبد   و ان نبقى متمسكين بهم كما في الأول حتى لو مر الكثير من  السنوات و مهما كبرنا و كبروا في السن و مهما تغيبوا عنا...  ، هذه الاغنية لامست قلبي حقا و جعلتني أفكر هل حقا سيبقى الأطفال الظالين و الستايز يحبون بعضهم البعض كما هم الآن حتى بعد إنتهاء عقد الفرقة حتى بعد مرور العديد من السنوات؟؟؟

author: @Ddabbong
text:
“꼬리를 흔들며 작은 몸으로 내게 있는 힘껏 달려올 때“ 들었을때
“오? 강쥐가 강아지 노래 부르네?? 귀엽다ㅋㅋ“라는 생각을 했어요.
하지마 계속 들으면서 노래가 무슨 의미인지 바로 알겠네요..ㅠㅠ

제가 태어난 순간부터 강아지와 함께 14년동안 살았었어요… 그런 말이 있잖아요  “당신에게는 학교도 있고 친구도 있지만. 강아지에게는 당신밖에 없어요“

이별할때 직접 내 강아지 무지개다리로 보낼 때 그 감정이 아직도 생생해요.
하지만 노래 그리고 가사 통해서 지난 14녕동안 행복했던 날들이 다시 생각 나네요.
가사쓰는 지성이 너무 잘했고 노래 부르는 승민이도 잘했고 우리 찬이 그리고 다른 프로듀서님들 너무 수고했고 감사합니다. 저한테 진짜 뜻깊은 노래에용 ㅠㅠ위로가 되네요❤

author: @Dizjisung
text:
Esta canción es un abrazo a mi corazón, cuando era adolescente mi mundo era completa oscuridad hasta q llegó a mi vida mi pequeño, cada vez q me sentía triste, sobre pensando, el siempre estaba a mi lado acompañándome. Él sintió felicidad cuando me vio feliz ya q había ingresado a la u. Paso un tiempo y el enfermó y falleció.
Yo pienso q el fue mi luz en mi mundo de oscuridad, creo q fue como mi guardian durante mis días negros y cumplió su objetivo cuando estaba algo feliz por cumplir una meta, fue muy triste su partida, aún lo recuerdo y siempre lo recordaré por ser esa luz y la compañía q tanto necesité. Gracias pequeño...

author: @arshkrka
text: Is this about a pet or specifically a puppy? Because I just lost my two cats and a hamster in the beginning of this year, my hamster was with me since 2020 during the hard time and after my father passed away too so 'he' had a special place for me. My cats were too, they accompanied me when I cried; consoling me by staying until I no longer had tears. The lyrics making me feel things about them, Seungmin did a great job in delivering the emotion like always. Thank you, Han and Seungmin, you guys really did well. 고생했어요.

author: @madewlyne
text:
Thank you stray kids 

It's weird, losing her one day was weird. It's been three months since I last saw her, since I cried like a little girl because I couldn't say goodbye to her. It still hurts.

Losing a pet is something that has happened before and I hate the feeling. Thanks for this song, I was able to find solace because I felt pathetic to miss her and to think what it would have been like if she looked at me with her big eyes.

I miss her and I hope that when we meet again she will be as happy to see me as I am to her <3


I'm sorry if you don't understand, I don't speak English lol

author: @gmed9230
text:
this is such a heartbreaking song especially for the people who has a strong connection with their pets who passed away... it's such a bittersweet song...

it hit me so much because my dog just crossed the rainbow bridge recently and it still stings because he's the sweetest dog ever. whenever I call him, he would always greet me with such enthusiasm. i was with him until his last breathe, i took care of him, put him in IV fluid (im a vet student) because it was really urgent before we go to the animal hospital. he was such a fighter, i know he wanted to fight his sickness but his body just couldn't take it.

i hope you're happy in puppy heaven, my love.

author: @るん-n5x
text:
16年間一緒に過ごしてきた愛犬と今年お別れしたばかりで、なかなか受け入れるのに時間かかったり、他の犬を見て涙が出てしまったり、辛いなと思ってしまうことばかりでした。でも、この歌を聴いて少し背中を教えもらえた気がします。

どんな時も隣にいてくれた愛犬と今は会うことができないけど、またいつか出会えた時には思いっきり抱きしめてあげたいなって思いました。16年の思い出と共にこれからも前を向いて生きていきたいです。

素敵な曲を作ってくれたジソンくん。
素敵な歌声で包み込んでくれたスンちゃん。
2人の温かさに私は救われました。
本当にありがとうございます。

author: @gena1720
text:
Вокал Сынмина приятный для ушей и оттого песни в его исполнении звучат волшебно, становятся сладкими. Их хочется слушать, когда нужно расслабиться или же заняться любимым делом. И "Hold On" не исключение. Настоящая сладость для ушей. 
Джисон, который написал лирику, как и всегда не разочаровывает. Его лирика всегда глубокая, со смыслом.
Я рада, что узнала удивительно трудолюбивых айдолов Stray kids. Спасибо Сынмину и 3racha за столь красивую песню. ♡

author: @nelle99
text: As a dog owner, this broke my heart. I've lost 4 dogs over the course of my life, and I currently have 3 and every single day, I'm grateful for them because they make me so happy. The thought that any day could be the last they run up to me, give me kisses, and rub themselves on me so I smell like them scares me. Seungmin's voice is perfectly suited for this song, and the wonderful message it carries. Thank you to Minnie, Hannie, and everyone else involved in this record. I will carry it in my heart 💚💚💚

author: @chrisismysweetie
text:
승민, 이 노래에서의 네 숨막히는 목소리는 그 시대를 초월한 고요한 공명과 따스함과 함께, 각 음표마다 내 마음을 감싸 안습니다. 나의 깊고 흔들림없는 애정은 너에게 특별한 경계가 없다는 것을 알아주기를 바랍니다. 너는 나의 삶에서 빛나는 빛이며, 네 존재는 상상할 수 없는 방식으로 내 여정을 비추어 주었습니다. 네 음악에 마음을 담아가며 네 건강과 안녕을 같은 열정으로 우선순위를 두기를 바랍니다.

3RACHA, 한, 그리고 방찬에게 네 감정적인 보컬을 완벽하게 부와지게 하는 훌륭한 작곡에 감사드립니다. 한의 감동적인 가사는 깊은 공감을 불러일으켜 마음으로부터 따뜻한 미소를 자아냈습니다. 네 보컬은 이 노래를 새로운 높이로 끌어올리는 결정적인 부분이며 🌟🎤. 계속해서 빛나고, 노래하며, 너 자신이 놀라운 아티스트로 남아주기를 바랍니다, 승민.

author: @chrisismysweetie
text:
seungmin, your breathtaking voice in this song, accompanied by its timeless resonance and warmth, wraps around my heart with each note. My deep, unwavering affection for you knows no bounds. You are a radiant light in my life, and your presence has illuminated my journey in unimaginable ways. As you pour your heart into your music, I also hope you prioritize your well-being.

I'm grateful to 3RACHA, Han, and Bang Chan for their masterful composition that perfectly complements your emotional vocals. Han poignant lyrics resonated deeply, evoking a heartfelt smile. Your vocals are the pièce de résistance, elevating the song to new heights 🌟🎤. Keep shining, singing, and being the incredible artist you are, seungmin.

author: @dnxse
text:
this is making me cry. 

My only cat, who always sleeps by my side every day, died a few weeks ago. I'm devastated, and I cried all day. The memories we make together are so precious to me that I am still sad. His photos on my phone are the only thing I have that I can keep forever. Now that I'm away from home and my cats, I'm gradually losing energy in the activities I most enjoy.  They are the ones who give me courage. 

This song just perfectly expresses how I feel. 

i love you, seiji! 
thank you, han, seungmin, and chann for creating such a heartwarming and good song. <3

author: @ClakyNotReversed
text:
Wooooo!!! Beautiful!!!! Amazing song! Lyrics by Han, composed by Han and Chan, arranged by Chan and sung by our amazing and super skilled singer Kim Seungmin!!!!
Hannie's lyrics for his songs are always so poetic.... I can tell a song is written by him immediately! And the fact that he wrote this beautiful song for Bbama is even more amazing, because it's not that common for songwriters to write songs about their pets (another beautiful one, for Kkami, is Little Star by Hyunjinie) ... And now that my dog, that I raised by myself (I adopted her when she was 3 months old circa, from an abandoned litter) , I took her in a couple of months after I started to live by myself... Now I am 30 and she is 10... And it makes me cry the only thought of her leaving me one day... So this song (and Little Star) makes me tear up a lot.... Beautiful, thank you for blessing us with your emotional and awesome lyricism, Hannie, thank you for blessing us with your beautiful music, Channie, thank you for blessing us with your unique, amazing, honey voice, Seungminie. Thank you for this other masterpiece, you always give us nothing less than masterpieces. ❤❤❤

author: @AishiBhattacharyaOfficial
text:
First I thought it would be studio version of Seungmin’s version of Justin Bieber Hold On cover.
But I’m so pleasantly surprised it’s an original piece from our Seungmo himself. Love the feels , will definitely come back again and again to listen to this beautiful creation. The vocals, the lyrics, the story, the feels … all of it is perfect ❤ 
Our Minnie we 💕 you .
P.S. Noticed in the credits that Han is the lyricist. The lyrics feel so like Han. Also the producer is Han, Chan and Versachoi. I bet Chan produced the track but this song melody feels a lot like a Han song, even more coz he’s the lyricist. Thanks for this beautiful song for Seungmin’s S-class voice.
Also maybe someday we can get a Han cover or duet of this song that he wrote.

素敵な歌をありがとうございます。

author: @saeedkhan776
text:
To Kim Seungmin,
I have loved to see you grow improve even though I just got to know you a few months ago. I love your beautiful soothing voice that can go with literally any genre in existence. Thinking of your existence has always put a smile on my face, thinking such a beautiful soul exists. You are a hard, diligent worker. You know how to have fun. You have a refreshing and contagious smile. Your voice, your singing gives me peace of mind. You push yourself to your very limit, only to push over that to a new limit you break and continue on. I just want to tell you that I love everything you do and you! You did well today, and that is for 365 days a year and 24/7 hours a day. I am excited to watch you grow and improve even more! I’m happy. Please don’t ever let your beautiful smile fade, ok? I love you!

- from a stay who loves you❤

author: @anastasiaf9002
text:
three weeks ago my best friend, my first dog, passed away. He was with me for 13 years, since I was 12, the last year he was struggling with kidneys disease, he was getting weaker every month and at the end we decided to release him from this pain. It was the hardest decision to make and I could not be next to him for his last moments, I was in other town and couldn’t get back on time. This is why I’ll probably feel guilty for the rest of my life. I couldn’t talk with anyone about it and cried only once, at the day, when it’s happened, after that I feel like everything inside me froze, crashed and now there is huge hole. I felt like I couldn’t release my emotions at all and it was hidden somewhere deep inside. But from the first line of this song I was able to release emotions at last. I’m still crying. I don’t know at all how to get over this, but at least I guess
 I can cry now 🥲 Thank you sungmin, thank you jisung, the song is really beautiful and healingly sad.

author: @tori1755
text:
え……これは無き愛犬への曲ということ…？最近なんかあったっけ…？？分からんがとても沁みる歌詞だ…
まず、日本語字幕ありがとうございます！
はああ…透き通る歌声が良すぎる…かわいい歌詞だからスンミン作詞かと思ったけど３RACHAだった！こんな曲も作っちゃうのね…

私も家に鳥ちゃんやハムちゃん居たときは玄関が賑やかで本当に幸せだったなあ…
いなくなった悲しみの方が強く印象に残ってたから、この曲聴いて、玄関開けたときのかわいいお出迎えを思い出して嬉しかった…！！
本当にスンちゃんの歌声は人の心を癒すね…大好きだよ！
あ、あとサムネのビジュが良すぎます。好きです。ありがとう。

author: @madam_xenon
text:
This song is something more than just a song.  It's more deeper. I can't stop crying because I also have a dog. He is six now. And I understand that someday I lose him. I love him a lot. He is my son, my friend, my brother and I think that I won't survive if something happens with him. It is very very painful to lose someone you love. So, Seungmin, thank you a lot for this song. I trust that it can help a huge amount of people. Also thank a lot to Han for such supportive song.
We love you a lot❤

text:
2年ほど前に亡くなった家族のわんこを思い出して涙が止まりませんでした。
大好きなスンミンの力強くて優しい声と一緒にあの子と思い出が頭を過りました。
私が虹の橋を渡る時、あの子がその先で待ってくれているという歌詞がとても心に残りました。
世界の全ての大切な小さな家族がいる人にこの歌が届きますように

author: @_skzwd_
text:
ооо божечки, эта лирика... это так прекрасно... этот инструментал, вокал сынмина.. это одно из лучших, что я слышала, это так трогает за самое серце, я могу догадываться кому посвящена эта песня и я думаю, что я права, но не буду распространять эту информацию, в любом случае нам очень дороги STRAY KIDS и их творчество, это очень исцеляет и мы готовы сделать всёс лишь бы вы тоже были счастливы и исцелены♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡
у меня раньше был кот, поэтому эта песня мне кажется ещё душевнее, не думаю, что смогу когда-нибудь отпустить эту песню, она слишком близка мне, спасибо всем, кто работал над этой песней, она прекрасная, в ней идеально всё
STRAY KIDS будьте счасливы тоже, спасибо за ваш труд, мы сделаем всё, чтобы всегда быть рядом, защитить и поддержать вас, а также исцелить♡♡♡♡♡♡♡♡

author: @cami_minho
text: i lost my dog a few months ago, it was shocking and i was the one who found it, i grew up with my dog, we shared so many memories together, i tried my best to make his life the best i could afford, until one day he just wasn't here anymore, my life was torned, changed completely but everyone around me seemed fine, i tought i might be overreacting, but while i'm writing this in tears i can finally understand that i lost my family, it's so hard to try to get back in life when you feel like you can't, eventually i did, i had to keep studying for college and all but i couldn't had done it without stray kids, i'm so gald that i had the luck to meet this guys years ago because everytime i feel alone or that i can't do it anymore they come to the rescue, i love you guys so much, and thank you kim seungmin for writing this beautiful song, and understand the love between humans and dogs, i love you forever my little puppy ❤️‍🩹

text:
Here I am. Tails wagging. Barking. Holy Crap. Han did not just have our Mong Mong sing this... AND THANK GOD HE DID!! OH MY GOD. THANK YOU SO MUCH! I'M ACTUALLY IN TEARS. And here I thought the first lines were already beautiful... The metaphors Han uses are always so vivid darn it. And having Seungmin's soulful voice sing it is just ugh 💘

edit: i am now just actually absorbing the lyrics and is Bbama okay? 😢 look, i was so into the first images that it just slipped my mind that incense sticks aren't time indicators 😭 and that the latter verses were literally ... darn it... this is FNF all over again but with more feels... AHHHHHHHHHHH

author: @biba7786
text:
Now I'm sitting here and crying.  
I had to let my Blacky go after 19 years and I'm still not able to let someone else into my heart. This song gives me hope to see him again one day.  
Seungmin, you have a beautiful and precious voice. You make us Stays so happy and we are infinitely proud of you. We love you ❤️
Han, you are a wonderful dancer, singer, lyricist and composer. 
I wish you a nice and loving time with your little darling. The wonder of these creatures is they will always love you unconditionally even if you make mistakes or are short on time.  
We too, Stays, love, admire and are absolutely proud of you. Feel hugged ❤️

author: @ambarsaurio
text:
Sé que la canción habla de los perritos pero no puedo evitar pensar en mi gato que falleció hace un par de semanas, la voz de seungmin y el mensaje de la canción, la letra, el sentimiento y todo lo que transmite es tan hermoso que no puedo evitar llorar mientras lo escucho. 

Extraño a mi gatito y esta canción es como una curita al alma, gracias seungmin por tanto, gracias stray kids por tanto, una vez más confirmo que stray kids siempre va a estar para apoyarme en mis peores momentos, tantas veces veces me han ayudado a seguir adelante y esta es una más de ellas, su música me ha salvado incontables veces. Gracias stray kids por existir 💗

author: @STAYing4Ever0325
text: It's been 2 years since my cat passed. And this song is exactly my feelings. Though I don't believe in heaven or hell. I'd like the hope that I can meet her again. This song and 'Little Star' by Hyunjin always make me cry. The hope that we all see our loved ones again gives us the strength to keep going on. Thank you for this song Han and Seungmin, and everyone involved in the production of this song. Thank you SKZ.❣

author: @konotsengegda8636
text: 3 months ago, I lost my rescue cat COCO by liver failure when he was only 10 months old. It felt as he was my soulmate and I thought to myself I would die for my precious baby, but I couldn't. Man, I miss him so much that even after all this time I still cry looking at his pictures, videos and accessories. COCO is only a memory now :(. Thank you Seungmin, for singing this beautiful song❤ I will listen to it every time I miss my baby. (not me weeping while typing)

author: @SakkaraKirax
text:
Seungmin, sweet puppy... was Hyunjin's Little Star not enough? I am a full-grown adult now sobbing over my best friend, Sandy, that I lost over 15 years ago. That good boy literally saved my life by getting help when I wasn't breathing and got me through some terrible times, right by my side. Having to say goodbye to him after 18 years of him in my life is still one of the hardest things I've ever done. 

Seungmin, your voice brings emotion to life like none other. It was beautiful, and I'm going to be inconsolable for the rest of the day. I'm sorry to anyone who has felt the pain of losing a beloved pet.

author: @amyellle
text:
O skz é um grupo que eu nunca pensei que seria fã um dia,mas quando virei fã, só me trouxe alegria, tenho passado por coisas ruins ultimamente, e o Skz está me ajudando a superar essas coisas cada dia mais, Seungmin é um dos integrantes que eu sinto mais orgulho, ele é tão perfeito e tem uma voz maravilhosa seus vocais parecem um anjo cantando.
Não precisamos streemar as músicas e ter 1 milhão de views para mostrar que amamos e nos importamos com o Stray Kids gente, apenas ouvir e apreciar já ajuda muito :)
Seungmin never disappoints 💗🐶

author: @Shespider
text:
Yes Seungmin is a Beautiful Singer with a lovely voice but those lyrics? I use the translation, yes, but listen to the korean flow? The choise of words, the interlinked themes - not only is the meaning something most of us can relate to one way or another, but every part of this arragement is perfectly thought out to create this emotional crescendo, matching the chorus lyrics perfectly - from pyring fire to roaring to ashes.... Also the thought of the once welcoming sight of a happy loved one waiting and now it's only the light again and only the hope of a next meeting in the distant future remains - 
I'm at relistening number three, and I can't find the words. Thank you. Thank you for writing this. Thank you for sharing this. Thank you.

author: @rosangelaq.f2303
text: The lyrics...how I miss my Pepito.... he was always the one waiting for me at home with a unique enthusiasm... sadly he couldn't stay as long as he should have been by my side. .... author: @Seungjin_mong
text:
Another song added to Hyunjin's playlist
Kidding aside, this feels like a warm rays of sun in the afternoon, a cup of hot chocolate in a winter day and a warm fluffy blanket in a cold cold night...
Kim Seungmin I love you, you are an amazing artist, I heard a lot of good voice in my my existence but yours is one of my favorite.
Whenever you sing, you dont just sing, you tells us a story, a tale, a conversation that only you can convey.
Thank you so much for this cover, I really really love your talent, you are so amazing and you improve day by day.
I will keep supporting you Seungminie, just keep on singing and inspire us with your song.
Fighting! 🖤🖤🖤

author: @ashiemal
text: In memory of my paw babies who recently passed on, Silver and Creamy, and the many others that went before, I dedicate this song to you. I love you forever and always. You guys will always be remembered with love. With a grateful heart, I thank you for choosing us to be your family until the end. Lastly, thank you, Han for translating into a song the words I didn't know how to say, and Seungmin, for singing to us so beautifully that it brought me to tears as I let myself be drowned in warm memories of my pets. 사랑해 <3

少し前にお別れした愛犬を思い出しました。どうかこのあたたかな、優しい気持ちをこの歌に乗せて、大好きな愛犬にこの歌が、想いが届きますように。
この曲を聴くたびに、空に向かって亡き愛犬に愛を送ろうと思います😌
素敵な曲をありがとう😌

승민아, 너의 목소리는 하늘에서 내려온 천사 같다. 너무 천사같아서 가끔 눈물이 나네요... 너무 잘생기고 재능이 많으시네요 저 위에 뜬 태양처럼 환하게 빛나는 미소를 더 많이 보여주세요. 당신은 하늘에서 내려와 사람들을 사랑에 빠지게 할 정도로 아름답게 노래하는 천사와 같습니다. 사랑해 승민아 항상 제일 좋은 사람이 될게 이 지루한 세상에 내가 가진 위로실수가 없을 정도로 완벽하게 노래하셨습니다.

text:
스트레이 키즈

아이돌이 아닌 다른 사람으로 널 사랑한 걸 후회해

나는 불가능한 것을 사랑했다
내가 있다는 걸 모르는 사람이 좋아

난 항상 울고 널 기억하고 널 볼 기회가 없었어

나는 당신의 언어를 말하지도 않고 모두 자막이 있습니다

너와 아홉 번째 멤버가 되고 싶어

제 글을 읽으셨으면 좋겠습니다

쪽지 답장 가능한가요


그건 그렇고, 내 이름은 리사이고 메디나에 살고 있고 16살입니다. 당신보다 어리기 때문에 할 수 없다는 것을 압니다
